summary: Ignia loses his little brother while Natsu is off meeting a sweet fairy.

This is my first fanfiction. The story of Natsu Souleater, son of Acnologia. "Yes, it is the truth. I killed many. 'But why' you must ask yourself. I was forced to do that so many times until I started to enjoy it. But you know what else is true? You killed as well. Did someone force you to do that? I think the answer is 'no'" dark/Natsu but not evil, stronger/Natsu, smarter/Natsu
In which Natsu fails to ask a very important question before starting to act very, very strange.
Gruvia drabbles and one shots!

The blood was so unbelievably rare. Who would ever be lucky enough to get their hands on it? You'd only ever see a dragon if you were stupid, everyone avoided them like the plague. It was a death sentence to even think about getting anywhere near where they lived. And, of course, she just had to know where one lived.
What happens after chapter 545 when Levy tells Gajeel that she's pregnant.
It was a usual day in fairy tail, or as usual as it can be. But that is about to change as fairy tail will see a new side of Natsu Dragneel, a side which no one knows.

Happy Lucy Day! This one-shot is dedicated to this Lucy Heartfilia day so I hope you like it! Summary: Lucy wanted to take a mission by herself! How will Natsu react to this? Art used while editing the cover is not mine so CTTO!

For Lucy a 'normal' day just might include being kidnapped and she's fine with that, but this time her 'normal' day turns extraordinary by finding a new family and future for herself. Featuring the lovely Desna's Pradesh family.
What he needed to do is to try and be a better person – not to be perfect – but to be man enough to one day be deserving again of loving the woman who loved him.

This is a tale of those that waited. The boy who missed his big brother. The girl who yearned for her best friend. The guild that lost so much, but endured so much more. And the one who joined Fairy Tail to change things for the better. "Let's see if I can get everyone to smile!" (Starts Post-Tenrou Arc, Self-Insert)

'What's going on with you and Gray ' Natsu asked. Lucy opened her eyes wide. He had perhaps been a little too abrupt, but he had to know.'What do you mean ' 'I saw you coming out of a restaurant with Gray.' 'Are you jealous ' Natsu turned bright red. 'I'm not jealous, I'm curious.'

Young Lucy Heartfillia finds herself in a narrow situation on her way to her vacation home with her father. In the progress of finding help, she has a fateful encounter with a fellow magic wielder; a boy claiming to be raised by a dragon... Part of the Fairy Tail Reverse Bang 2022! Art by NarminaX
She was no longer a human, she could no longer sleep or eat, so why did the little life in her arms make her feel so uncertain?
A universe in which Natsu calls Lucy a bitch in the heat of the moment. Middle-school AU. Tumblr prompt.

Sting and Rogue have always been brothers, but they've never been equals. It was always Sting who was the strongest. Sting who became Guild Master. Sting whose actions mattered. And on the day the dragons reappeared, Rogue finally discovered why. Oneshot, Rogue-centric.

Natsu meets Lucy for the first time when she's meeting Gray for their first date. Call it love at first sight, you wouldn't be wrong. ONESHOT - (also Gray is pretty much a dick in this story sorry Gray lovers!)

'You can't dance either ' Natsu asked. 'Juvia hasn't been to many parties. And when she did, she didn't dance, she was afraid of being ridiculous. But this time, she hopes to dance with Gray-sama.' Suddenly, an idea crossed Natsu's mind and he grinned from ear to ear. 'How about we practice dancing together '
Lucy should be happy they are back together after a year, but how can she stop these bitter sweet feelings from being uncovered. Will she forgive natsu for leaving her?
Crawford has a dilemma over Siegrain's literacy. Apparently he's an intelligent man that is literately stupid. How fantastic.

The truth behind what drives the SaberTooth Guild to be as ruthless and driven as they are has never been clear. Behind the stony face and heartless actions, lay a Guild of people who's true selves are kept hidden, for sake of pure fear of the Master. The only people who know the truth are those in the Guild itself, afraid... and prisoners, in their own ways. Like she was, trapped.
The marriage story of Jellal and Erza, when everything is closed and they want to spend some time. (It was on my AO3 account : SiegrainSirius)
"Natsu, do you even have fears?" What Lucy asked and wondered whether she will get the answer to that. Or perhaps, he just doesn't have one.

Ariella is dreading the bedrest she has to be on for the remainder of her pregnancy with her twins, but Freed is determined to make her happy again with a surprise for her. And when he does present it to her, Ari is left ecstatic and they indulge in the sweet treats together-and apparently, their twins love them too.

During a play date at the Fairy Tail guild hall, Igneel and Athena bond with each other via playing with Bickslow's doll Pappa, until Aqua joins in with another of Bickslow's dolls. Elsewhere, the elder children play and the two set of twins explore the guild-with one of them making a scene afterward. Setting: Year X800 I do not own Fairy Tail.
It's April Fool's Day in the Fairy Tail guild, and Juno has a few practical jokes in store for Laxus and the Thunder Legion. Will she be sly to pull them off and get away with them?

One of those generic "Lucy feels weak & depressed, gets a form of restrictive eating disorder, Natsu takes his first steps to leading her to recovery" stories where I'm actually just self projecting. One-shot (possibly future two-shot) canonverse nalu-centric. Don't hesitate to give me reviews!

Mirajane, Lisanna and Bickslow are responsible for keeping an eye on Ariella and Freed's three young children, and Mira shares a special bond with her baby goddaughter Athena. This story takes place in July X799, three months after the births of Athena and Iggy. DISCLAIMER: Fairy Tail belongs to Hiro Mashima, and Athena belongs to me.

Ariella is left to take care of her two-year-old twins while Freed is away on a mission with Bickslow and Evergreen. As she anticipates the birth of her third child, she recalls the promise he made to her and has high hopes that he will return in time for the baby's arrival. Setting: April X799, during her pregnancy with her daughter Athena. I do not own Fairy Tail.

In which a funeral doesn't go as expected, and Gray is left with more questions than answers. Lyon himself is no stranger to loss, and he knows his little brother well enough to see that he definitely isn't coping well with it, so perhaps he can help. ...He will try, at least.

After having two daughters, Lucy Dragneel anticipates the birth of her third child as she does some household chores. Later, she and Happy help Natsu with grocery duty and she discusses with him of the baby after checking up on the girls. This story occurs in April X799, during Lucy's pregnancy with their son Igneel (a.k.a. Iggy). I do not own Fairy Tail.

Laxus may be strongly supportive of Sloane during her pregnancy, but when he's away on a mission, Sloane has someone to accompany her while home alone. It's her rabbit spirit Lepus, and she is curious to learn what it would be like for her to feel Sloane's baby. Takes place after my previous story, "Sloane's Baby Blues". I do not own Fairy Tail. Sloane and Lepus belong to me.
She saved him when he couldn't even save himself. For that, he will always be grateful. One-Shot Fluff!

This one shot centers on the bond of Natsu and Lisanna. It is set during the time they are kids looking after Happy. My longest one shot yet I feel like. My third one shot of Fairy Tail. Slight romance. For Natsu and Lisanna shippers.

NaLi Week 2022. Natsu and Lisanna have a bond that has endured more than a few bumps in the road. From bonding as children to growing closer in the coming future, nothing can every truly break them apart.
Happy 10th Gruvia Week! Short Fanfics that may or may not be related to each other.

Based on chapter 84: An Icy Fantasy of the 100YQ manga but from a NaLu POV. For the first time in his life, Natsu was ready to give up on a fight and remain in the world of his dreams. Everything he had secretly desired was offered to him on a silver platter in the Mugen Setsugekka, what more could he ask for? Slight OOC. Is rated T for themes. Contains fluff.
It's strange the people one turns to, in the midst of grief. - graymira

Whether it was just a glimpse of the future or a fragment of an unrealized past, Gray's death at the hands of the dragonlings has been haunting Lyon. He finally caves to go check on his little brother, only to realize that something has been bothering Gray too.

Natsu makes pancakes for Lucy as an aplogy for his destructive actions on their last missions. The pancakes may not be the best but it sure melts Lucy's heart. At the end of the day, Lucy falls asleep with her head resting on Natsu's lap. (Sorry For The Messy Summary)

The draken is an elusive, rare creature. So rare, most don't believe it exists. Rumors circulate of one, an adult, that lives in the bay next to Magnolia. Even though no one has seen it, sailors are always on their best behavior there. Pirate Captain Lucy is in search of her own. One she can befriend. One that can protect her base. One she has already met, many years ago...
When Lucy accidentally burns her tongue, Natsu tries to soothe her pain with his kisses. [One Of The Cutest Requests On Tumblr]

Alex gets kidnapped by a dark guild and when she's finally back Lucy gets upset. Read to find out what happens! The cover photo is what she looks like! She doesn't use a weapon tho so just imagine it's not there lol3
If Lady Juvia could only go back in time; she would never pour her love to him. She could have escaped these misfits and never had her fate intertwined with the crowned prince.

She was in utter turmoil upon their return from the island, and worried greatly about her missing best friend...only for him to show up when she least expected it. Now reunited in the darkest hours of the night, Lucy Heartfilia and Natsu Dragneel face one of their hardest trials ever. The thought of losing each other all over again.
Lucy and Natsu being nostalgic for 60% of the story with only 40% actually being about the New Years. Presented to you 4 months late. Enjoy!
Gruvia Oneshot (166 words) What if one-day Juvia snuck into Gray's house and replaced all of his clothes with her own custom-made ones.

Natsu is a boy with a particular distaste for dragons. When his brother Zeref is killed by one, Natsu kills the dragon, only to be transformed into one himself. His brother Gray vows to kill the dragon Natsu has become; with the help of a dragon fledgling Wendy Natsu embarks on a journey to become human again and, along the way, learn just how powerful love can be.
He had quickly realized something the moment he met the blonde. That no matter what form Lucas took, Natsu would of always fallen for him. Genderbent Lucy x Natsu

Igneel was here, right in front of him. After so long, he has been searching for as long as he can remember. Maybe that's why he forgot. Forgot that despite the fact he was a dragon, he was still his dad, and still knew ways to completely and utterly embarrass him. NaLu
High School AU 》rent a date for four hours

He hadn't gone willingly. It was only because everyone was being annoying and that the master was worried that Natsu had decided to go visit Gray. Before pushing the door open, he'd expected to find him in bed, pressing ice to his burns and lamenting his loss during their last fight three days ago. What he did find was something else entirely.

Levy goes to a rock festival to see some of her favourite bands, but is too short to see over the crowds! Who's gonna help her? (Written in 3 hours after 3 days no sleep at the Download Festival UK which it's based on) Gajevy/GaLe etc. One-shot.

Natsu would consider himself pretty tough. He was strong physically, and trained both his body and mind for battle. He has an abundance of scars and bruises and he wasn't ashamed of showing them off. So why was she making him feel weak?
Aquarius had known for a very long time, she could feel it through her key. Even as her key shattered before her, she was going to be there for Lucy, and push her in the right direction. NaLu
His lips were soft and chapped against her own and Lucy felt the faint tickle of breath beneath her nose as the duo breathed each other in. [A HighSchool AU]

AU, one-shot. Erza is frustrated with being treated like the runt of Fairy Tail and decides to do something about it. Unfortunately her efforts land her in trouble, but thankfully, she has someone watching out for her.
Little moments that caught my shipper's eye. Current story: Nightmares After Edolas, Gray's having trouble sleeping.

"More, it was Valentine's Day and that meant that there would be some excitement. And flowers, a lot of them. As well as chocolate, as boxes of chocolate were handed out as a means of a declaration. Natsu was fidgeting." Natsu/Gray, twoshot. Pre-slash.

It seems like a great thing when a new ice mage joins the guild, at least until Gray's health starts deteriorating and the new girl begins taking his place on the team. Gray doesn't want to be replaced. And with Porlyusica warning he risks death if he doesn't figure out what is sapping his magic, it's a race against the clock and Gray's on his own.
His smell was no longer on her, and it was driving him completely insane.
"S-so, you're a celestial spirit mage? You have keys?" He gulped. "I mean which keys do you have?" he mentally slammed his head down on the bar, he was so smooth.

On the run criminal Cobra accidentally, by no means of his own volition, adopts a dragon? Yeah…that’s not disaster waiting to happen. A short-story of my two morally grey dragon slayers becoming bros ;)
Lucy ends of finding a horrendous spider. Natsu s not home what will she do!
She's always been there for him, since the very beginning. A small drabble where Natsu tells Lucy just how important she really is. Can be seen as romantic and/or platonic.
Lucy accidentally discovers the effect pet names can have on her boyfriend and things, in true Fairy Tail fashion, get a little out of hand.
Laxus is something of a clingy boyfriend, especially in private. Of particular interest to him? Lucy's skin care routine.

It wasn't just mother vs. daughter. It was blood, despair, and a woman made weak by love vs. found family, hope, and a woman made so much stronger by it. An alternate look at Irene vs. Erza. Oneshot, Jerza.
All Lucy wants to do is take a nap with Laxus. And maybe she could if Team Natsu would stop flattening cities and leaving Laxus with a mountain of paper work.

Wendy likes Natsu and is more than determined to make him fall for her. Unfortunately, he's pretty dense towards her, and she's worried about Lucy! Will Wendy's feelings be able to reach him? A Natsu X Wendy / NaWen fanfic. Slow-burn story. Takes place after the final episode of Fairy Tail. Adapted from 'When the Sky Falls for the Flame' by SilverWrath.

Juvia was about to stood up, but Gray stopped her by putting his hand on hers. She looked at him, surprised. He blushed and he looked away. 'You can stay if you want. I mean, it's late and you're tired too.'

Everyone knows the story of Cinderella, Snow White, and Little Red Riding Hood by the Brothers Grimm. But no one knows the true story behind the three maidens and if you read this you'll know but you'll find that it differs from the stories that you've heard before.
Made on request and rated because I'm paranoid. AU.
Lucy chooses Valentine's Day to finally confess her feelings for Natsu. High School AU.

During the Grand Magic Games, Jellal finds himself followed and almost exposed by Lahar when someone saves him out of nowhere. Only now, he finds himself even more cornered, especially when his saviour in the closet decides to take drastic measures.
Capricorn accidentally reveals Levy's deepest secret. How will Gajeel react when he hears about a certain quiz? Levy/Gajeel
'And with that, we ran, hands clasped together as we create a new chapter of our lives.' A Valentine Special for you guys! Hope you like it! NaLu, Gruvia and GaLe!
Rufus is looking to make a scene, and the flashiest way to disable an opponent is to drag out their most crippling memories. Gray has plenty of heartbreaking ones to spare.
Monday mornings are usually the worst, but Juvia can't help but enjoy this Monday
Natsu leaves on a job that keeps him away from Magnolia, the pink-haired slayer unaware his girlfriend was pregnant.

One hundred candles burned in the Heartfilia Mansion each night. Like a beautiful ghost at nightfall, Lucy wandered the long hallways with a tinderbox and matches in her thin, graceful hands. She lit the candles on windowsills, and my role was to observe quietly, as if every candle had a name she'd only whisper to the wind, never to me. / NaLu, Natsu's POV

*Revamp* Ch. 1 What if Mira has another plan, and it involves with moving a body through the night? Well, Laxus is not happy. Ch. 2 The girls have a sleepover, and the males get invited. Where does Mira suggesting lead too? Fem!NatsuxLaxus

Your red string becomes visible on your 18th birthday, but only to those who believe. Juvia is determined to find out who's on the end of hers despite the fact that she already has a crush on someone.
When he wins hot springs tickets for two from a grocery lottery, Sawyer is at a bit of a loss for what to do with them. Armada project: 62/365

All chapters have been moved to the title "Light and Dark Collide" so you can read all of it over there. Fresh updates will be made on my profile. This old journey of mine, just got really interesting.

The Raijinshuu didn't really understand Freed's relationship with Mard Geer. It just didn't make sense. But Freed seemed happy, so they should just accept it. What they absolutely not do was spy on them. So of course, that's what they all do. [Freed x Mard Geer One Shot]

Gray has always trailed after Natsha and he was fine with that until their time together was cut in half, getting shorter with each passing day, and a new player entered the field. How is he suppose to make his love apparent when Natsha always thinking about fighting and baseball? School!Fic, Fem!NatsuxGray/Lyon, Love Triangle, Other pairings (LoLu)

Just a small drabble : After Natsu and Happy return from his one year training and meet their blonde friend, she welcomes them in her new apartment with a smile and hides her own pain. Natsu sneaks into her bed at night, seeking her comfort but he faces an unwanted situation. Lucy is hurt because of him!

Natsu scrambles to find the perfect gift for Lucy after she mentions how she’s looking forward to tomorrow. He’s got one problem, though: He doesn’t know what tomorrow is! Is it her birthday? An anniversary? A holiday? Dragons don’t celebrate human holidays! What’s a young dragon slayer to do? A funny, romantic one shot for Valentine’s Day. With NaLu and Gruvia!

*Revamp* No one wants to be Happy's father...at least not Laxus. The two are somehow together...by a certain pink-haired girl...and they have to survive the day together. Implied Fem!NatusxLaxus and Parental!LaxusxChild!Happy

*Revamp* Natsu is under a poisoning. She isn't waking up. As fate would have it, Laxus is chosen to take Natsu to Porlyusica. What will come with this tale? Why is Mirajane's name written all of this? Fem!NatsuxLaxus Fem!Natsu
*Revamp* It's Valentine's Day at the guild, and Gray has been gone on a mission for two months. He's back with some flowers. And Natsu is the lucky gal. Fem!Natsu Fem!NatsuxGray AU OOC-ness
*Revamp* Laxus always had an eye for Natsu, and Mira decides to get risky. How will they get out of these...handcuffs! Fem!Natsu, Fem!NatsuxLaxus
Natsu takes Wendy out with him on a job. Full summary inside. Read and review. Constructive criticism is welcome, but please no hateful comments.

Crocus, X792. On the day that Lucy gave up hope of ever seeing her old guild again, she receives an offer to help revive Fairy Tail from the last person she was expecting. Alternate Avatar/Alvarez arc. COMPLETE.
*Revamp* It's a late night for Gray, and all that he wants to do is sleep. Fem!Natsu, slight Fem!NatsuxGray (if you squint), oneshot. Gratsu Week Day 4 (Gender Bender)

*Revamp* Modern AU. Gray stood in front of the wooden door and gulped as he knocked. Inside was his girlfriend, Natsu and her overbearingly father, Igneel. Will Gray make it through dinner or will Igneel murder him upon entry? Human!Igneel Oneshot Fem!Natsu Fem!NatsuxGray

*Revamp* He spent two months away from the guild to avoid Natsu. He decided to take his chance on Valentine's day to confess but she wasn't there. It's miserable for everyone. What happened to Natsu and how will Gray deal with this? AU, Different Timeline, Fem!Natsu GrayxFem!Natsu

What if Lucy knew someone from Fairy Tail the whole time, but didn't know as she didn't know where her childhood sweetheart had ran off too? What if Lucy had a secret? And what after Laxus' actions, Lucy brought her secret to the guild and found something she had lost? The story of the two upper class members coming together again.
*Revamp* Have you ever wished upon a star? Has it been fulfilled? Some wishes are made to be true, just like Jellal's. Jerza One shot Fluff. Fairy Tail Novice Writing Challenges entry
Juvia wakes up with memories of a past life and eventually finds a reason to start again. She tries not to drown in the process.
*Revamp* What if Natsu was pregnant? What if the father was Sting? What if a certain blue haired girl wanted to know about the birds and the bees? Oneshot Fem!Natsu NatsuxSting

*Revamp* Being forced into situations by friends, Laxus and Natsu must now experience speed dating because of Mirajane. Why does she keep doing this to Laxus? Such fun! Fem!NatsuxLaxus Oneshot OOC-ness

*Revamp* Natsu doesn't wear a bra for the life of her. Lucy tries her hardest, but Natsu realized her mistake when Gray comes into the picture. Fem!NatsuxGray Gratus Hints of LucyxLoke Oneshot crackfic

*Revamp* The guys were able to persuade Natsu into going to the park with them. With Sting, Gray and Gajeel fighting for Natsu's attention, will they be able to keep the park intact? Oneshot Sting/Gajeel/GrayxFem!Natsu Fem!Natsu Reverse Harem (kinda)

The first time Natsu saw the legendary vigilante known as The Celestial Spirit, his life flashed before his eyes. But only days later, he saw her as an irreplaceable ally: Lucy. Two criminals of differing stature meet by chance, conquer evil by necessity, and save the world by the orders of fate.
It's Lucy's birthday, and her friends invite her to a night of beer, fried food, and karaoke at their favorite dive bar. What more could a girl ask for on her birthday?
Everyone has to take their first steps eventually. Better late than never. - Part of the Remember Me series.

It's time for the legal guilds to ally together to defeat the Dark Guilds! A retelling of the Oración Seis Arc mostly told from Haru's POV. Read and review. Constructive criticism is welcome but please no hateful comments.

Long distance relationships can be hard, but they're making it work. With Freed visiting Gray and Natsu visiting Bickslow, the two new couples have plans to catch up with what they've missed and make the best of their time together.
When the time comes for Lucy and Natsu to break their team ...
When Lucy suddenly began a prank ... Gray is haunted.

Lyon is content with his ordinary, boring life, but everything changes when he meets a legend one night on the beach. Now there's an injured, beautiful, but strangely voiceless selkie in his home, and it's up to him to help her...and maybe break a curse. He might even fall in love along the way, but it's dangerous to love a creature whose heart belongs first to the sea.
This is just a letter to you all letting you all know my plans for 2022
In which Juvia is out on a mission, Gray is sulking, and Mira is a little shit. (But don't tell her that)

In a quiet moment, Gajeel and Freed see each other in a way they'd never considered before. Attraction hits them with sudden fury, and both men don't know what to do. So, what else can be done but going to their friends? And, their friends' unexpected partners, apparently. [Freed x Gajeel Evergreen x Levy Bickslow x Gildarts]

Professional footballers Natsu and Freed have been dating in secret for months. When they win the championship match, Natsu is filled with an overwhelming energy and desire to kiss his boyfriend in front of the camera, the crowd, and and world. And he's not exactly known for impulse control, is he? [Freed x Natsu]

Fairy Tail's strongest team has embarked on the Century Quest, a job that no one has been able to complete in a hundred years, not even Gildarts. But they have something else no one before them has had: a team of powerful wizards. So when the matter of the quest takes them by surprise, they won't back down, determined to be the first to complete this exciting and dangerous quest.

(COMPLETE) When Natsu's injuries sustained in a recent guild brawl with Gray prevent him from participating in this year's S-Class exam, how will he cope with the inevitable future ahead of him without his closest and most powerful Nakama there to guide him every step of the way? More importantly, what does this mean for the future of the Fairy Tail Guild hall?

With Lisanna being back from Edolas, she feels that her and Natsu can come together and be what she always dreamed them to be as a kid. But can they? and What about Lucy? (Not a typical Lisanna is back story) I like Lisanna but I don't think she would have accepted being pushed to the side like she was, not without a good reason so... here we are. I hope you enjoy.

Bickslow and Natsu are the kind of men who thrive in a nightclub, so of course they gravitate towards each other. Without words they're dancing, flirting, and maybe something more. Gray and Freed do not belong in a nightclub, but they can make the best of a bad situation. Lamenting over bad friends and a bottle of champagne, maybe the night might not be so bad after all.
The mages of Fairy Tail are sent a lacrama that will allow them to watch Team Four Star's Dragon Ball Z Abridged. (My first time doing this, so please go easy on me)

After his death, Mard Geer Tartarus only lived in the minds of his demons. Where his other demons killed his remnants, Freed allowed him to remain. Now, two years later, they meet in Freed's dreams, converse, toy with each other and flirt. Not a situation either expected, but they both find it rather enjoyable. [Freed x Mard Geer]
Lucy has one mishap after another, at this most blunderous time of the year. (Thought I had uploaded this yesterday, whoops!)

Natsu and Wendy manage to stay together after coming through the Eclipse Gate. They are found by Mystogan and brought to Fairy Tail together. How will this effect their relationship as the years go by and they form a team together as well as an unbreakable bond and make new friends. Fairy Tail Remake with Natsu/Wendy siblings AU, Nalu vs Nali love triangle.
It is said that if you shake the snow globe while making a wish, it will come true/Many people said that it was true/Could it also be true to you? Natsu/Gray. Modern setting AU. Christmas RomCom.
This Christmas, Fairy Tail members decide to play Secret Santa. What will everyone receive and from whom? Christmas countdown fanfic, one new chapter each day, until Christmas Eve.
Based on the holiday Ova. Set when Jellal offers to walk Erza back home after her... *ahem* escapades.. Sorry if it's lame. I worked on it for a week but wanted to post it as a xmas story. Enjoy!

Natsu and Lucy want to go on some jobs for Christmas money, but due to a snowstorm, they are trapped inside Natsu's house. Lucky for Lucy, Natsu has the ability to make people forget about the worst things that are going on, which is something Lucy always appreciates. Some NaLu fluff for the holidays. I hope you enjoy.
Natsu is missing on Christmas Eve and it's going to take a miracle to get him back home. NaLu. Read and review. Constructive criticism is welcome, but please no hateful comments.
gajeel and levy have a quiet conversation christmas evening (with only a couple interruptions from their friends). – modern!au. gajevy. mild nalu. rated t for language.
She was predictable... and all he had to do was wait. NALU fluffiness - enter at your own risk!
Lucy feels bad that her hair and skin products make Natsu sick. Can she find a solution? Will the scent driven dragon slayer be able to control his impulses without the barrier?

After years of pestering, Mirajane convinces Freed to place rune traps around the mistletoe, with the agreement that they would only activate if both sides wanted to kiss. Little did he know that he'd be a victim of his own magic, and with Gajeel no less. [Freed x Gajeel One Shot]

Gray opened the kitchen door. Behind the table he saw Greige standing on a stool. He was cooking something. 'What are you doing ' Gray asked. 'I'm baking a cake for mom. She come back from her mission today. We always bake a cake when you come home from a mission, I thought she would be happy to have one too.'

Natsu x Erza, probably one shot. Implied sex. I don't really know how to label this, lemon but not lemon. Erza gets blushy and Natsu gets a little pushy? Controlling? Not in a bad way though. The idea was to make people smile at it in a stupid kind of way.

Clarion Jones is the guild master of Dahlia Town's first and only mage guild, Frantic Heart, a guild that embodies living in the moment, and she will drag it all the way to the top if it kills her. Oliver Jones needs a drink. (Discontinued SYOC)
When the ice-rink accidentally books the figure skaters and the local hockey team at the same time, Gray falls for Juvia in more ways than one. – modern!au. hockey/figure skater!au. gruvia.

Lucy Heartfilia was a cute, shy, innocent girl but she had social phobia.Natsu Dragneel was handsome, popular prince of the FairyTail College. But he was called as 'playboy' by other people. When their worlds collided, what would happen? Love at first sight, Misunderstandings, Broken trusts, Hate and Love. Would they find LOVE someday?

After a sudden storm, an unknown boy washes up on the shore of the beach near Fairy Hill's. Upon being discovered and helped out by Wendy the two form a team doing jobs with one another but it isn't too long that their lives get disrupted with sudden events of time in certain area's reportedly coming to a standstill and the two getting caught up in the middle of it all.

Since the world had forgotten about mages, turned their backs on the magic for strict religion they had grown ignorant and scared in these times of poverty. The rich took and the church praised them for it in the same breath they condemned the poor for the sin of want.  Thou shall not covet. And Lucy did not. She wanted no part of the perfect little tool her father wanted her to be

Natsu asks Lucy out on a date, but things don't exactly go as planned. Takes place before Oracion Seis Arc. Contains the NaLu pairing. Constructive criticism is welcome but please, no hateful comments.
nope

When Lucy's car breaks down on Christmas Eve, she seeks shelter from the snow in a small roadside store, where she meets a pink-haired cashier with a heart of gold. – modern!au. nalu. rated t for language.
Sometimes best friends fight. (rewrite to the original).

Young Lucy, unbeknownst to her, has been locked away in a tower since she was stolen as an infant by an evil witch. On the day of her 18th birthday, precocious Lucy becomes curious about the outside world, and when a handsome stranger uses her tower as a refuge, she asks him to help her escape in order to live.

After their curse is broken, what do Zeref and Aki- -Natsu's twin sister- -intend to do? Whatever they have to go through, they have their brother-finally alive and beside them-to help them, and his adoptive guild family. No major character death, eventual happy ending, genfic/freeform.
Lucy loves Erza so much that she resorted on leaving the the knight for the latter's sake. What will happen if Lucy came back after years like nothing happened? (Erlu)
The Fairy Tail Guild recovers from the Battle of Fairy Tail. Full summary inside. Read and review. Constructive criticism is welcome but please no hateful comments.
Jerza two-shot. When he was plunged in guilt, she was there to lift him up. When she is plunged in darkness, is he there to help her see the light?
After Levy saves Gajeel from being turned into a sky constellation he confronts her about it. The argumentation between them that follows might reveal their true feelings for each other. Levy/Gajeel
Using her star dresses came with an unexpected price. Now Lucy has the personality of whatever spirit was connected with the star dress? That just spells disaster, especially for Natsu! NaLu
Just like that, her morning was turned into a complete mess. With her best friend turned into a child, she's taken it upon herself to care for him. But maybe…this was a blessing in disguise? NaLu.

The morning after their first time, Gray discovers a scar in Juvia's body that he hadn't noticed before. The water mage tells him the story behind the mark, remembering him of a past relationship she had with Bora, and how it was way worse that what he had imagined. Of course, after knowing the truth Gray won't be able to stay put, right?

A collection of one-shots/requests made and posted on tumblr. Mostly Nalu, but other pairings may slip in! Ratings may differ per story. This collection is no longer updating and All future one-shots will be posted on A03.

Ask b4 putting in any C2s. It has been two years since Lucy broke up with her ex-fiancee and dated anyone. She was given a card by a good friend Mirajane and assured of the 'good results'. It was taking a chance, she knew, but what better way to get back into the dating scene than with a little help of a Dating Service? Only, she had no clue what she was doing by calling up Dial 1.
Mirajane asks Laxus a question that takes him a few to fully comprehend. - one-shot
It was ridiculous. Surely the most stupid idea they ever had. But nobody gets credit for just ideas, do they ?

Just a little short about Lily discovering Levy's pregnancy and thinking of how it will affect his life. Will he have to move out now that Gajeel's house may be too small for all of them? Well, the dragon slayer sure have some thoughts about that crazy idea...

In Fairy Tail episode 20 "Natsu and the Dragon Egg!", there was a moment where Natsu and Happy have a fight over fish then he proceeds to snap at Lucy for an off handed comment she made after the blue Exceed storms off, one that made him remember Lisanna. His response was curt, harsh, and I always wondered if he ever apologized to her for it.

After Lucy helps him finally ask Levy out, Gajeel wants to repay the favor and being a dragon slayer himself, he knows how to get a reaction out of Natsu when it comes to Lucy. Natsu/Lucy with hints of Gajeel/Levy
Gray's life is thrown into turmoil when he ends up on an unexpected road trip with the demon who accidentally possessed him.

X795, one year after the finale of Dawn of Darkness. Lucy has accepted that Fairy Tail is over and that everyone has gone their separate ways. But a fateful encounter one day tells her that Fairy Tail isn't over just yet...

Book-1 of Modern Fairy Tail Romances Trilogy. Lucy Heartfilia, smart and sweet girl and Natsu Dragneel, Fairy Tail High's playboy. Natsu liked her but he stayed away from her because of a reason. What would happen what Natsu found out the truth? Did Natsu love Lucy truly or was she a part of his revenge?

"Foolish. Foolish. Foolish! You are of no importance to him. You are no one. You don't matter to him. If he feels the same, then why did he push you away at the beach? How come he never looked for you when you were frozen at Tenroujima? He doesn't care about you, Erza. You need to stop." I don't own Fairy Tail-Hiro Mashima does. I'm terrible at summaries.

Zeref Dragneel is a cold and greedy business man who pushes away his loving brother Natsu and mistreats his hard working employee Gray but one Christmas Eve night he meets three spirits who are determined to change his views on life forever.

Its the Halloween night. Lucy is trying to catch the attention of a certain dragon slayer. What will the night bring? This is rated T to be safe. Ratings may change to M if I choose to do a lemon scene. If not it'll stay as T and do upload the lemon separately.
Lucy discovers something about herself after sharing a bottle of wine with Natsu and everything changes, hopefully for the better. - One-shot.
Where Natsu, a ladies' man, had kept on wanting to see others and Erza, his lover, had had enough.

For the Flufftober2021 Tumbler event, a one shot collection featuring cute, funny, and heartwarming moments between Gray and his friends… and his cat, Joy. Featuring some NaLu, a bit of Gruvia, and BroTP from Lyon, Cana, Laxus, and a fair amount of visits from the Connells. A tie-in to “Let’s Play the Quiet Game- Recovery”

Thirty-one tales, one for each day of October. It's a series of one chapter spooky stories that involve the characters of Fairy Tail, but I'm not sure if I have a total of thirty-one chapters. If you have a spooky story, tell me about it. Let's try to get a total of thirty-one. Rated T just to be safe.

Forced Binding could cause the recipient some repercussions such as confusion, extreme fatigue and emotional stress. It just so happened that Erza was experiencing them. (People said it was madness, Natsu called it love.)
NaLu Lucy gets abused by Jude, Natsu finds out cliche (No other FT characters cos it's my first fanfic so tryna keep it simple)
Next door neighbors are always too cute to resist.

There was a sound of a soft and slow music. Gray felt the atmosphere change. The music, the starry sky, Juvia's beauty. All of this made the atmosphere more romantic. It was perfect. His face turned a faint pink as rubbed the back of his head in embarrassment. He gave his other hand to Juvia. 'Can I have this dance'

Natsu has never thought that the red string of his fate is tied onto a small pinky which belongs to a certain blond-haired toddler. But... Perhaps the string is also extended to the toddler's mother? This is a story of a spring that blooms between him and her. AU! Kindly RnR.

The fight against Acnologia is over and peace is restored to Earth Land. But now, Team Natsu has received a new mission from the Magic Council to help a mysterious man who has lost his memories, and ends up plunging them into a brand new adventure to save their world. FINALLY COMPLETE

Just as Erza decides to give up on a hopeless love, Natsu decides to take his chance on a seemingly unobtainable love. But it's not going to be purely rainbows and sunshine, especially when other people's feelings are to be put into consideration.
My take on Ft 100YQ, Chapter 66: At Edolas. Where Natsu recalls meeting Nasha for the first time and what that means to him. How could one little girl have such a profound impact on him?

For some reason that can only be a coincidence, everyone finds themselves with some sort of memory with a pink-haired boy. Someone who seemed to just travel the world, was always in the right place at the right time (or perhaps it was wrong, but who was to say?) I really, really liked this story but I feel in my bones that I won't finish it. I'd rather not let it waste away.

The Underworld, an illegal market, is hidden from view yet impacts everyday life. The students at Fairy Tail high are constantly in the midst of Underworld affairs and have to learn how to deal with one of their own as well as well hidden dark secrets. Highschool AU. *I've posted everything I have, whether or not it has all the inner sections / makes total sense yet.

Natsu Dragneel: Adopted son of the fire dragon Igneel; infamed destructive mage known as 'Salamander'; cares deeply for his comrades; member of the infamous mage guild Fairy Tail. Natsu Dragnologia is much the opposite. When they switch places, things get worse before they get better. posted for the sake of posting

When Freed and Laxus are suddenly turned back into children during a highly stressful, S-class mission, the rest of the Fairy Tail guild don't quite know how to respond. But Lucy has questions, and the first one she wants answered is: why in the world is Freed acting like a mangy, wild animal?

Evangeline was married to the king asshole of Fairy Tail, Laxus Dreyar. The key words there is was. What happened exactly? Will they get back together? And what other secrets is Evangeline hiding? Follow Evangeline on her journey to finding herself, and what it means to love. What is means to be a family.
Drinks are for friends. But gossips are for friends that somehow forgot to knock.
"Listen everyone, I decided that today, I will give all of you a hug, so come at me!" When this has come from Titania Erza Scarlet, it goes without saying that everyone is freaked out.

Erza's past is revealed as Natsu, Haru, and the others hurry to rescue her. A retelling of the Tower of Heaven Arc from Haru's POV. Read and review. Constructive criticism is welcome, but no hateful comments.

This is what I wish would've happened after Erza and Mira got kidnapped during the Tartaros Arc, and after Jellal beat the former Oracion Seis. This is a one-shot and it is in Jellal and Crime Sorciere's perspectives, hence, the title. Sorry for the typos. Haven’t proofread it. I don't own Fairy Tail-Hiro Mashima does.
gray helps juvia understand and deal with her new status as a werewolf. they become friends along the way. – werewolf!au. gruvia.

It was the first time in these few days when Gajeel could rest in the shadow of a tree after a long individual mission. He had just come out of the infirmary with the bandaged hand: the injury wasn't serious but still needed medical attention. The missions at The Magic Council were sometimes hard, just like this time.
If this is love, I'm willing to go anywhere with you. Post-Idol AU. GrUvia.

Freed and Laxus were inseparable friends, they always spent their days together ever since they were children, so much so that they were considered indivisible. That's why everyone was surprised when Freed went to Germany and Laxus knew nothing about it. After three years the two will be forced to see each other again, and for a period to live under the same roof.

Wendy and Lucy Marvel have a problem, the rest of Fairy Tail has returned to Magnolia and they have no idea if they're still as strong as before, because with them, Fairy Tail may actually have a hope of winning the 7th Grand Magic Games. [Discontinued, thank you for the support. Last chapter is fixed]
Lucy slowly opened her eyes. The sun was rising, a new day was beginning. This day was special. It was Natsu's birthday.
Having just returned from Edolas with their missing Fairy Lisanna, Lucy is left wondering if anything will change for Team Natsu. NALU Fluff
Basically ideas that I have for stories but I'm too busy to write them so I'm giving them away for free.

The magic swelled in him, draining his energy. It was more powerful than any of his previous spells. More terrible than the rune of pain, more sinister than darkness, more vigorous than the rune of fear. It was pure evil and Freed was beginning to enjoy it, knowing full well the spell would end too quickly to relish it. Or: the story of how Freed lived with his demonic magic over
Hand in hand, with newfound tenacity and optimism, Erza and Jellal resolve the tensions knitted in their relationship.

He feels something boil as he looks at her, motionless and blurred. Something twists, another pulls, his knees almost give and the darkness of a world without Lucy in it swallows him whole. Alternatively, in which Natsu finds peace with Lucy laying on his chest.

The more drunk you are, the more honest you become. Natsu will expierience this first hand. Fairy Tail normal world AU. NaLi One-Shot DISCLAIMER: FAIRY TAIL BELONGS TO HIRO MASHIMA. ALL RIGHT BELONG TO HIM
a snapshot into gray and juvia's life together, in the year when fairy tail was disbanded. gray-centric.

There had been many false alarms in the past, moments when she thought Gray would finally accept her feelings. She once again had her hopes up, even though she knew this was probably another one of those.

Left blind and mute from his harrowing ordeal, Gray must adapt to his new way of life as he tries to heal from the traumas, while the rest of the team is tested through the many trials that follow. Meanwhile, Gajeel's team is investigating an alledged serial killer. Part Two of the series.
Because Juvia is in love with her patient.

Collection of short one-shots on Freed paired with whoever I can think of. 1 – Jail (Freed/Cobra) 2 – Pranks (Freed/Minerva) 3 – Eyes (Freed/Bickslow) 4 – Bet (Freed/Gajeel) 5 – Training (Freed/Lucy) 6 – Chess (Freed/Rufus) 7 – Jealousy (Freed/Laxus) 8-Flirt(Freed/Loke)

Maybe the perfect life that little Lucy dreamed of all those years ago isn’t really what happened, actually none of it happened. I took all the prompts from Nalu week and just merged them into one story
Wendy and Chelia welcome an unexpected member to the family. Chendy one-shot fluff
30 years is a long time, especially if that is how long since you last saw the love of your life. Chendy one-shot angst… sorry

Juvia has reached a point where she fears that things with Gray may never happen. So she thinks that the best thing to do is put some distance between them in order to help herself accept reality and move on. But what she doesn't know is that there are more to Gray's feelings than meet the eye. Juvia takes a solo job out of town to clear her head. Is Gray too late?
Coming home from a mission is always better when there's someone waiting for you. For Gruvia Day/Greige Day/Gruvia Family Day 2021
She had a boyfriend and she was happy. Until someone re-entered her life and messed everything up.
AU. A mission takes Natsu and Gray to a strange town. In the end they get more than they bargained for. And not all of it is good. Natsu/Gray

Gray is captured and used in the plot of a vengeful enemy from his father’s past. Natsus’s and Gajeel’s teams must put their lives on the line to rescue their friend, before all of Fiore is endangered by the mad man’s ultimate goals. Part One of the series.

A simple bauble, a keepsake, a mere trinket, his father’s cross was never much to look at. It was rather dull, not worth a great deal. It had no magic whatsoever, but somehow had the power to draw two unsuspecting strangers together, forging a bond like the very links of its chain. The story of Silver and Mika’s first meeting.
The boy ran off, before Juvia could say anything. She wanted to call him, but he had not told her his name.

Sueong Ryuto gains the power of an Ice Dragon Slayer after being taught by the Ice Dragon King himself, who then suddenly disappears without a trace. Now Sueong is determined to find him, he joins the Arckabalos Guild and fights tough battles along the way, even if it's against Fairy tail. What's next after he find's him? We're about to see. Current Fight: Acnologia

within the rain, dark streets of the old city of Crocus, a fated meeting, one of midnight romance with rain pouring in the air. A girl like the moon, and a boy a simple admirer. StingYu [Sting x Yukino] one-shot. set in Modern time, with Crocus base off of the city London England [roughly].

Forced to be sociable by his so called friends, Laxus finds himself attending a five week cooking class. An insulting and stupid idea, and one he resents them for doing. He would have thrown it in their faces, if it weren't for the smug prick teaching the class, with his handsome face, delectable body, and annoyingly enticing way of keeping Laxus on his toes. [Fraxus One Shot]
Sequel to Tears of Rain: [SADLY DISCONTINUED]

Natsu and Erza had never met in their lives, but when they do, it causes a spark to fly. Two people, from two different backgrounds, with the same friends, find themselves in an intense pining game to find out more about each other. (Natsu x Erza) (Minor pairings) (Minor cast cameos) (Cover: Chrome-Asakura)

Everything has its own consequences. Lucy's decision to rewrite the Book of E.N.D doesn't end up in a happy ending like she thought it would be. Natsu is indeed safe and sound, but what about her? Set in the one year gap after Alvarez War arc! Kindly RnR.

(Follow-up to my previous MidLu Halloween story) Midnight has no idea what to expect from this Halloween party and no reason whatsoever to go. Except there is, in the form of a bright-eyed blonde girl who's expecting him. And there's not a chance in hell he's letting her down.
